long_description:
# VoxeLibre Soaking Rain `vl_soaking`

![Screenshot](https://content.minetest.net/uploads/1f62b9701d.png)

This mod makes you take damage under rain/snow, unless you are:

* wearing leather helmet and leather chestplate *or*
* holding an umbrella (a new item) in your hand (or offhand).


The crafting recipe for the new umbrella item is as follows:

![Recipe](https://i.imgur.com/s79olpI.png)
